name: Sales, R&D, R&D intensity, and employment for companies that performed or funded business R&D in the United States, by selected industry and company size: 2021
description: Sales, R&D, R&D intensity, and employment for companies that performed or funded business R&D in the United States, by selected industry and company size: 2021

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: _b_industry_naics_code_and_company_size_b
variableMeasured.description: Industry, NAICS code, and company size hierarchy

variableMeasured.name: field_domestic_net_sales_millions_a
variableMeasured.unitText: Millions of dollars, percent R&D intensity, and thousands of employees

variableMeasured.name: field_all_r_d_millions_b
variableMeasured.unitText: Millions of dollars, percent R&D intensity, and thousands of employees

variableMeasured.name: field_r_d_intensity_c
variableMeasured.unitText: Millions of dollars, percent R&D intensity, and thousands of employees

variableMeasured.name: field_domestic_employment_headcounts_in_thousands_d_total
variableMeasured.description: Domestic Employment Headcounts In Thousands D Total
variableMeasured.unitText: Millions of dollars, percent R&D intensity, and thousands of employees

variableMeasured.name: field_domestic_employment_headcounts_in_thousands_d_
variableMeasured.description: Domestic Employment Headcounts In Thousands D
variableMeasured.unitText: Millions of dollars, percent R&D intensity, and thousands of employees

variableMeasured.name: field_domestic_employment_headcounts_in_thousands_d_r_de
variableMeasured.description: Domestic Employment Headcounts In Thousands D R De
variableMeasured.unitText: Millions of dollars, percent R&D intensity, and thousands of employees

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Industry classification was based on the dominant business code for domestic R&D performance, where available. For companies that did not report business codes, the classification used for sampling was assigned.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, Business Enterprise Research and Development Survey, 2021.
